description:
A couple raise a snake, a kappa gets married, and a Fava Bean, Straw, and Charcoal take a trip to Ise
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hebi Musuko / Kappa to Warazouri / Soramame to Wara to Sumi
The Snake Boy / The Kappa and the Straw Shoes / The Fava Bean, Straw, & Charcoal
蛇息子 / カッパとわらぞうり / そら豆とわらと炭
